wiktionary_senses.definition: A generally accepted means of exchange.
A currency maintained by a state or other entity which can guarantee its value (such as a monetary union).
Hard cash in the form of banknotes and coins, as opposed to checks, credit cards, or credit more generally.
The total value of liquid assets available for an individual or other economic unit, such as cash and bank deposits.
A person, family or class that possesses wealth.
An item of value between two or more parties used for the exchange of goods or services.
A person who funds an operation.
An unincorporated community in Leflore County, Mississippi, United States.
An unincorporated community in Gloucester County, Virginia, United States.
